summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 2.1°C) and outside temperature (down 1.8°C) and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 3389 lux) and cloud levels (up 365 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1301 m), light levels (up 5727 lux), feels like temperature (up 3.1°C), and outside temperature (up 2.6°C) when compared to today.

Today’s cloud levels is 364.7m lower than yesterday, 919.2m lower than past week, 1301.2m lower than past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 860m to a maximum of 3110m, averaging 1508.7m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2430m and 2810m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. A few light raindrops may fall, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright intervals likely. Low pressure may lead to stormy or rainy weather.
